task.title: Target Content to URL Parameters and Values
task.shortdesc: You can target content to URL parameters and values to display specific content when certain conditions are met.

step.cmd: Create or edit an A/B...N, Multivariate, Landing Page, or Display Only campaign or test.
Click Target this campaign for the target level that matches your strategy: Campaign, experience, mbox, conversion or success metric.

stepresult.p: If you choose the campaign level, you must first choose a specific mbox that has the URL parameter associated with it. Then select the campaign level target link.

substep.cmd: For display when, choose URL Parameter.
Choose from the parameters associated with the mbox (in the example above it is "productId.")

Select the comparison type. Insert all values relevant to this target condition. In the example above a visitor must pass one of three values- 1, 5 and 28 - of the productId parameter in order to be shown the content.

stepresult.p: Tip: You do not need to preload values in order to target on URL parameter values. Simply type in the values here.

substep.cmd: To add conditions, click on <Add another condition>.

stepresult.p: This permits you to create a more restrictive "and rule."
Your target rule is summarized on the screen.

step.cmd: To save the campaign, click Save.
